name: Clone Adventures
description:
We took a new look at 2D platform games for Clone Adventure’s creation. New genre in classic platformer: 20 dynamic levels with unique architecture and unforgettable experience. Start the game and enjoy it!
Lead cute clones. They pass through the teleport in looking for troubles. They like looking for troubles! They can’t settle to it. Everyone do all as one. Help them overcome all obstacles.

Features:
* A fresh approach to 2D platform games
*20 beautiful and unique levels
*Achivements
*Hard puzzles
*Cute non-pixel game graphics

We are beginners in indie-game development. We will be glad to your support and activity.
